titleStmt.title: SII 5.282: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 282. (A.R. No. 606 of 1893). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . kolottuṅkacoḻatevaṟku yāṇṭu Eḻāvatu kiranūrāna koḻumaṅkoṇṭacoḻanallūr mahātevarAn inscribed stone about 10” broad, not connected with this inscription is inserted here between the letters r and ti and extends to ll. 2 to 4.tiruvākcūramuṭaiyār koyi
ṟ kūttāṭuntevaṟkum Umāsakitaṟkuñ cuntaraṟkum viṉāyakappiḷḷai yāṟkun tirumāḷikaippiḷḷaiyāṟkum Amutupaṭikku viṭṭa nilam tāmarai
kuḷamum peruvāykkālukku vaṭakku Aṅkarāyar ceykkut teṟku nilam Orumākkāṇiyum pūṇṭiyil nilam vaṭakkup pāykiṟa vāykkālukku meṟku
nilam Araimāvum melaipperuvaḻikku vaṭakku nilam Araimāvum Ikkoyil nittayaperaiyaṉukku Iṭṭa nilamāṭakālvāyil Aṅkarāyar ceykku me
ṟkku Āḷuṭaiyapiḷḷaiyār tevatānattuA similar stone as in the above case intercepts ll. 5 to 8.kkut teṟku ni
lam kāṇiyum Āka nilam Irumāvaraiyum Ittevarkaḷukku
kalveṭṭik kuṭutteṉ coḻan kaṇṭiyāna tiruveṇkāṭu
ṭṭunaṅkaiyen Itu cantirātityavarai Itu panmāhe
śvarar rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 5.282 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Renato Dávalos.
